orig_text:
userpart     = unreserved / sub-delims
                     0*( unreserved / pct-encoded / sub-delims )
notes: The original text would require the first character to be in one of the unreserved or sub-delims sets, but internationalized URIs use percent-encoded UTF-8. The correction allows the userpart to begin with percent-encoded UTF-8, in accordance with section 6.
